channel.title: What is the problem?
channel.description: I post something in the help section, I make no errors grammar-wise, and it's easy to solve. Then I see my thread going further down on the threads list, as people answer to the users who have no grammar skills, "talk liek this withot capitol leters or periods", and some who are just plain mean. I end up not recieving a responce. Why do people do this?

item.title: What is the problem?
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

The answer is because half of you don’t bother to read the stickies which explicitly state that you MUST show work you have tried yourself aka were not a spoonfeeding community,

furthermore most are the results of not knowing basic Java which makes me wish there was some sort of test (like there used to be) before you’re even allowed to make an account to atleast filter out some of the people who are getting errors in there compilers because the c&p tutorial they read didn’t work for there server.

Its supposed to be the server help section aka SERVER specific, not helping you fix your compilers errors or spoonfeeding you when you don’t know what variables/if statements/loops are.

In your case with your NPC problem and with most other problems that take someone who has half a brain, you can thank your fellow moparscapers for that simply because some people like me hate going to the server help section because you have people that post client specific stuff, Compiler stuff, things like “how can i change exp rate” without even using google or the search bar.

Read full topic

item.title: What is the problem?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

It’s because everyone’s jealous of your 120!

Tbh, I should start posting in that section more.

Read full topic

item.title: What is the problem?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Aff:

if it’s so easy to solve, why are you bitching that no one is helping you when you could solve it yourself

some of his questions were incredibly stupid, but some were somewhat legitimate for a moparscaper.

OP: i’ve answered quite a few of them.

Read full topic

item.title: What is the problem?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

jmood128:

We don’t have to help you if we don’t want to, creating a thread over not getting help isn’t going to get people to help you…

actually, i am less of an assweasel - i might pay attention to his threads more.
